title: Accessibility problems
description: I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working.
OB: When I launch the Help view on Windows 2000 on March 26, 2002, the tab key does not perform any action.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view on Windows 2000.
2. Press the tab key and observe that it does not perform any action.
